All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BindedAnswers
The class responsible for mapping correct data and binding them with view
BodyImageFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic image view in the quiz with four answers
BodyPopupImageFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic image view in the quiz with six answers
Constans
The class stores constants and helper variables that are globally available
CorrectAnswersDto
The class responsible for mapping correct data quiz from server
CorrectSliderDto
The class responsible for mapping correct data for slider question type
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FourAnswersFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic quiz with four answers (one correct)
FourAnswersMultiFragment
he class responsible for rendering the dynamic quiz with four answers (multiple correct)
HomeFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic user home view
HubConnectivity
The class responsible for connecting to the server thanks by gameplay hubs
ItemViewModel
The class responsible for transferring data between fragments and activities
LobbyActivity
The class responsible for rendering the waiting room view and handling the waiting room logic
LobbyDto
The class responsible for mapping data from lobby view
MainActivity
The class responsible for rendering the login view and handling the login user logic
MenuActivity
The class responsible for rendering the main menu view
ProfileFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic user profile view
Quiz_Activity
The class responsible for rendering and replacing the quiz gameplay views and answers
QuizDto
The class responsible for mapping main data for providing information about the quiz
QustionType
Enum helper class responsible for assigning types of quizzes
ResultActivity
The class responsible for rendering result view
ResultDto
The class responsible for mapping correct data during summary view
SettingsFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic user settings view
SixAnswersFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic quiz with six answers (one correct)
SliderCorrectFragment
The helper class responsible for rendering sliders with correct answer
SliderFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic quiz with slider type
StartActivity
The class responsible for rendering entry application animation
TimerDto
The class responsible for mapping timer time from server
TrueFalseFragment
The class responsible for rendering the dynamic quiz with two answers (true/false)
User
The helper class responsible for storing the entered data from the user's view
UserInfoDto
The class responsible for mapping data for the user profile
UserLocalStore
The class responsible for storing data and handling logging in and logging out user from the app
UserLogedData
A class responsible for storing data after a successful user login
UserResponseBody
The class responsible for storing the returned data by the server after a successful login
